uk.gov.gchq.palisade.policy.service

Class Policy<RULE_DATA_TYPE>

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.gov.gchq.palisade.policy.service.Policy<RULE_DATA_TYPE>
  • Type Parameters:
    RULE_DATA_TYPE - The Java class that the rules expect the records of data to be in the format of.

    public class Policy<RULE_DATA_TYPE>
extends Object
    This class is used to store the information that is required by the policy service but not needed by the rest of the palisade services. That includes separating the rules that need to be applied at the resource level or the record level.
